Text: thanks for the upload but that's it, I'm done for good with this show. this has to be the worst season finale ever. what looked like an awesome show turned out to be a total disaster.

It's a really good show. Dunno what crawled up Leto's snatch but this wasn't a terrible ending. The story didn't have a conclusion so it wasn't all wrapped up with a pretty little bow on it in the end, but that doesn't mean it's bad. It could have been more satisfying but so what? Lots of shows end the season with a cliffhanger.
